history.proof: intros H x y Hx Hy Heq. qsimpl time: 1 use: nat_sinc. assert (a <= x < y /\ y <= b \/ x = y \/ y < x <= b) as [|[|]]. - lia. - qsimpl time: 1 use: nat_sinc. apply Nat.lt_ind_rel. * sfirstorder depth: 3. * sfirstorder depth: 3. * qsimpl time: 1 use: nat_sinc. * apply Nat.lt_ind_rel. -- sfirstorder depth: 3. -- sfirstorder depth: 3. -- sfirstorder depth: 3. -- sfirstorder depth: 3. - sfirstorder depth: 3. - sfirstorder depth: 3.

ctx: intros H x y Hx Hy Heq.
exceptions.tactic: pose proof (nat_sinc f a b) as Hs.
exceptions.exn: In environment f : nat -> nat a, b : nat H : forall x y : nat, a <= x < y /\\ y <= b -> f x < f y x, y : nat Hx : a <= x <= b Hy : a <= y <= b Heq : f x = f y The term "a" has type "nat" while it is expected to have type "forall x0 : nat, ?a <= x0 < ?b -> f x0 < f (S x0)".

ctx: intros H x y Hx Hy Heq.
assert (a <= x < y /\ y <= b \/ x = y \/ y < x <= b) as [|[|]].
exceptions.exn: The reference Hs was not found in the current environment.

assert (a <= x < y /\ y <= b \/ x = y \/ y < x <= b) as [|[|]].
exceptions.exn: In environment H0 : forall (f : nat -> nat) (a b : nat), (forall x : nat, a <= x < b -> f x < f (S x)) -> forall x y : nat, a <= x < y /\\ y <= b -> f x < f y f : nat -> nat a, b, x, y : nat Heq : f x = f y H1 : a <= y H2 : y <= b H3 : a <= x H4 : x <= b H5 : forall x y : nat, a <= x -> x < y -> y <= b -> f x < f y H : a <= x < y /\\ y <= b Unable to unify "y" with "x".

original: intros H x y Hx Hy Heq. pose proof (nat_sinc f a b) as Hs. assert (a <= x < y /\ y <= b \/ x = y \/ y < x <= b) as [|[|]]. - lia. - destruct Hs with (x:=x) (y:=y) as [_ Hxy]. ++ split. * apply Hx. * lia. ++ rewrite Heq in Hxy. lia. - contradiction. - apply Nat.le_antisymm. + apply Hy. lia. + apply Hx. lia.
